lead_paragraph: Peter Wohlleben, a career ranger, has topped best-seller lists with “The Hidden Life of Trees,” describing trees as social beings that communicate on the “Wood Wide Web.”
snippet: Peter Wohlleben, a career ranger, has topped best-seller lists with “The Hidden Life of Trees,” describing trees as social beings that communicate on the “Wood Wide Web.”

headline.main: German Forest Ranger Finds That Trees Have Social Networks, Too
headline.print_headline: Where We See Tangled Trees, He Sees Social Networks

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: The Hidden Life of Trees: What They Feel, How They Communicate - Discoveries From a Secret World (Book)

abstract: Saturday Profile of German writer Peter Wohlleben, whose book The Hidden Life of Trees: What They Feel, How They Communicate--Discoveries From a Secret World makes case that trees are social beings and has become surprise hit.
